title: Debate on IMF today in Parliament
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Parliament will convene on Friday (8) at 10.00 AM under the auspices of Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena.
There will be an adjournment motion debate on the International Monetary Fund’s report on Sri Lanka.
The relevant resolution is to be brought to Parliament by the Samagi Jana Balawegaya.
Shortages will be resolved soon, public should not underestimate trust placed in Govt
